_header: And then the Apostles together went
_description: ‘How þe apostles made þe crede’ — forty short couplets

BLAdd39996.First Lines:
And þen þe apostles togeder wentAnd made þe crede
                    wiþ gode entent…
BLAdd39996.Last Lines:
…How Ioseph abaramathie wiþ wrakeHas done in person for
                    goddes sake
BLAdd39996.Editions:
Bowers,  Robert Hood. 
             “Three Middle English Poems on the Apostles’ Creed.” 
             PMLA
         70 (1955): 210-22: 214-16.
